question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. parking meter
B. motorcycle
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The parking meter is in the immediate foreground, with pink flowers directly in front of it, while the motorcycle is behind the parking meter and further back in the scene.
